results.title: Development and Evaluation of Novel Metformin Derivative Metformin Threonate for Brain Ischemia Treatment
results.text_hl: We previously demonstrated that chronic @<m>DISEASE_Post_Infectious_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000094025 @@@post@@@-ischemic administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ improved functional recovery in experimental @DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@cerebral ischemia@@@.

results.title: Impact of Prior Metformin Use on Stroke Outcomes: A Systematic Review and Updated Meta-Analysis.
results.text_hl: Conclusions: Pre-@DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@ @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy is associated with better @<m>DISEASE_Post_Infectious_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000094025 @@@post@@@-@DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@ clinical outcomes and lower mortality rates.
